maqras.text: 3|93|Ta'orata nayila ha'oyara age is‌ra'ila tara nijera upara ya harama karechila [1] ta chara bani isara'ilera jan'ya yabatiya khadya'i halala chila [2]. Baluna, ‘yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o tabe ta'orata ana ebam ta patha kara.’
3|94|Erapara'o yara allah‌ra upara mithya ratana kare tara'i yalema.
3|95|Baluna, ‘allah‌ satya balechena. Kaje'i tomara ekanisthabhabe ib‌rahimera millata anusarana kara, ara tini musarikadera antarbhukta chilena na.’
3|96|Niscaya manaba jatira [‌1] jan'ya sarbaprathama [2] ye ghara pratisthita hayechila ta to bakkaya, barakatamaya o srstijagatera disari hisabe [3].

3|97|Tate aneka suspasta nidarsana ache [1], yemana makame ibarahima [2]. Ara ye ke'u sekhane prabesa kare se nirapada [3]. Ara manusera madhye yara sekhane ya'oyara samarthya ache, allah‌ra uddesye ai gharera hajba [4] kara tara jan'ya abasya kartabya [5]. Ara ye ke'u kuphari karala se jene rakhuka, niscaya allaha srstijagatera mukhapeksi nana [6].
3|98|Baluna, ‘he ahale kitabagana! Tomara allah‌ra nidarsanasamuhera sathe kena kuphari kara? Ara tomara ya kara allaha tara saksi’.

3|99|Baluna, ‘he ahale kitabagana! Ye byakti imana eneche take kena allah‌ra pathe badha diccha, tate bakrata anbesana kare? Athaca tomara saksi [1]. Ara tomara ya kara, allah‌ se samparke anabahita nana.’
3|100|He muminagana! Yaderake kitaba deya hayeche, tomara yadi tadera dala bisesera anugatya kara, tabe tara tomaderake imana anara para abara kaphera baniye charabe [1].

3|101|Ara kibhabe tomara kuphari karabe athaca allah‌ra ayatasamuha tomadera kache tila'oyata kara haya ebam tomadera madhye tamra rasula rayechena [1]? Ara ke'u allahake drrhabhabe abalambana karale se abasya'i sarala pathera hedayataprapta habe.
3|102|He muminagana! Tomara yatharthabhabe allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara [1] ebam tomara musalima (paripurna atmasamarpanakari) na haye kono abasthaya mrtyubarana karo na [2]

3|103|ara tomara sakale allah‌ra rasi drrhabhabe dharana kara ebam paraspara bicchinna hayo na. Ara tomadera prati allah‌ra anugraha smarana kara, tomara chile paraspara satru, atahpara tini tomadera hrdaye pritira sancara karena, phale tamra anugrahe tomara paraspara bha'i haye gele. Tomara to agnigartera dbaraprante chile, tini tomaderake ta theke raksa karechena. Ebhabe allaha tomadera jan'ya tamra nidarsanasamuha spastabhabe bibrta karena yate tomara hedayata pete para.
3|104|Ara tomadera madhye emana ekati dala yena thake yara kalyanera dike ahabana karabe ebam satkajera nirdesa debe o asatkaje nisedha karabe [1]; ara tara'i saphalakama.
3|105|Tomara tadera mata hayo na, yara tadera nikata spasta nidarsanasamuha asara para bicchinna hayeche [1] o nijedera madhye matantara srsti kareche. Ara tadera jan'ya rayeche mahasasti.

3|106|Sedina kichu mukha ujjala habe ebam kichu mukha kalo habe [1]; yadera mukha kalo habe (taderake bala habe), ‘tomara ki imana anara para kuphari karechile [2]? Sutaram tomara sasti bhoga kara, yehetu tomara kuphari karate.’
3|107|Ara yadera mukha ujjala habe tara allah‌ra anugrahe thakabe [1], sekhane tara sthayi habe.
3|108|Egulo allah‌ra ayata, ya amara apanara kache yathayathabhabe tela'oyata karachi. Ara allaha srstijagatera prati yuluma karate cana na.
3|109|Ara asamane ya kichu ache o yamine ya kichu ache saba allah‌ra'i ebam allah‌ra kache'i esaba kichu pratyabartita habe.

3|110|Tomara'i srestha um'mata [1], manaba jatira jan'ya yadera bera kara hayeche; tomara satkajera nirdesa dibe, asatkaje nisedha karabe [2] ebam allah‌ra upara imana anabe [3]. Ara ahale kitabagana yadi imana anato tabe ta chila tadera jan'ya bhalo. Tadera madhye kichu sankhyaka mumina ache; kintu tadera adhikansa'i phaseka.
3|111|Saman'ya kasta deya chara tara tomadera kono ksati karate parabe na. Ara yadi tara tomadera sathe yud'dha kare tabe tara prstha pradarsana karabe; tarapara tara sahayyaprapta habe na.

3|112|Allah‌ra pratisruti o manusera pratisrutira ba'ire yekhane'i taderake pa'oya geche sekhane'i tara lanchita hayeche. Ara tara allah‌ra krodhera patra hayeche ebam tadera upara daridra nirdharana kare deya hayeche. Eta e jan'ye ye, tara allah‌ra ayatasamuhera sathe kuphari karata ebam an'yayabhabe nabiganake hatya karata; ta ejan'ya ye, tara abadhya hayechila ebam simalanghana karata.
